ABOUT.TITLE: about-me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
Hello, I'm Dylan!

 I'm a self-taught front-end developer based in Bruxelles, Belgium. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern, user-friendly web experiences.

 Transforming ideas and designs into websites has been my passion for over a year now and I want to share it with the world. I have been helping various clients establish their online presence and I am always looking for new challenges.
 I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.

CONTACT.TITLE: contacts
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION:
I'm actively looking for a job in the development field, front-end is prefered but I'm open to do full-stack development as well.
However, I am also open to freelance opportunities.

If you are interested in working with me, please feel free to reach out.

FUN_FACTS.TITLE: my-fun-facts
FACTS: I never decline a game of chess
I find working out boring but I do it anyway
